idea-plugin.name: Simple CamelCase
idea-plugin.description:
'Toggle Case' support camelCase .remove 'Toggle Case' shortcut.CAMELCASE <-> camelcase camelCase <-> CAMEL_CASE



default keymap:
windows -> ctrl + shift + U
Mac -> command + shift + U
just make caret on the word that you can convert it. (不选择会转换光标位置上的单词)
role:
CAMELCASE -> camelcase
camelcase -> CAMELCASE

camelCase -> CAMEL_CASE
CAMEL_CASE -> camel_case
camel_case -> camelCase
camel_camelCase_CASE -> CAMEL_CAMEL_CASE_CASE

other:
Better to remove 'Toggle Case' shortcut or replace it.
How to remove:
Settings -> keymaps -> search 'Toggle case' -> right click -> remove shortcut
idea-plugin.change-notes: Simple CamelCase plugin contain idea native plugin 'Toggle Case'
